TopicTitle: Playing luna multiplayer with Realism overhaul

Articles.Content: My friend an i are using RO and Lmp but when i try to join my server. The server says i need terrain quality high, but some mod i use for RO set's the quality to new text and i can't change it to high, it just changes back.
I had this problem in RSS as well.  The solution is to use KSP 1.9.1 or above and set the server terrain quality to "Ignore" in the configs.
Ya i figured that out after
Do I need to close this somehow?

You can mark an answer as correct and that will show in the thread list as answered, but here threads regarding questions are generally not closed so people that have the same problem can post in the same thread.
